attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to consider ending the national lockdown. It has been a whole year in lockdown and the number of suicides are at an all time high. Please end the lockdowns, end the restrictions give the people their common law god given right to be free and live their life’s.
attributes.background: I want the government to end the lockdown and allow all Buisness to operate as normal with no restrictions and allow people to rebuild their life’s.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995

Drastically ease lockdown once the most vulnerable have been vaccinated
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569883

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
